channel.title: [PI]Connection Problems For Others[PI]
channel.description:
Hey i'm making a server using 'Exion' client and source from MoparScape server downloads, and I changed the IP in client.java(client sided) to my Hamachi IP( ONLY UNTIL MY FRIEND GETS HIS NEW COMPUTER TO HOST xD )... well anyways, my mate connected to my Hamachi, and couldn't log in, yet I can log in from the computer i'm currently hosting it on.
Help please anyone? MSN: [email]itchy-mitch_99@hotmail.com[/email] [b]PLEASE ADD IF YOU CAN HELP![/b]
~~~Frosty~~~

item.title: [PI]Connection Problems For Others[PI]
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

Hey i’m making a server using ‘Exion’ client and source from MoparScape server downloads, and I changed the IP in client.java(client sided) to my Hamachi IP( ONLY UNTIL MY FRIEND GETS HIS NEW COMPUTER TO HOST xD )… well anyways, my mate connected to my Hamachi, and couldn’t log in, yet I can log in from the computer i’m currently hosting it on.

Help please anyone?
MSN: itchy-mitch_99@hotmail.com
PLEASE ADD IF YOU CAN HELP!

~Frosty~
